trans:
Page 2 of 2 Fill in the following blanks: - Write the appropriate verb in the blank. 1. _____ The painting is beautiful. 2. They are ____ The foot. 3. He is ____ In the pool. 4. I am ____ The story of the TV in the evening. 5. We are ____. The TV is in the evening. - The correct answer: Choose 1) From the separate pronouns: he * he, I, we, them * this, this, that, these * from, to, about, on. 2) The separate pronouns are divided into 3 types: a           *Noun, verb, letter. *Human, animal, plant* Speaker, absent, addressed. Aaaaa. He 3 (This, they (pronouns) he, from the family: *Speaker pronouns* Absent pronouns* Addressee pronouns* Not pronouns 4 (Not us) The family of absent pronouns: he *he* we* them* 5 we (is not used for: *Plural *For all of the above *The example 6 I (indicates: *Masculine only. *Masculine and feminine. *Feminine only.
